{"step_by_step_thinking": "The EuroQol 5-Dimension Health Assessment (EQ-5D) is a tool used to measure health-related quality of life. The '5-Dimension' in its name refers to the five dimensions it assesses, which are mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression. Each dimension is assessed with a single question, so the EQ-5D is indeed a 5 question assessment.", "answer_choice": "A. yes"}
